Description.Text: With friendly staff and a cosy atmosphere, the conveniently located Lorenzo Hotel offers good access to the Krakow-Zakopane motorway and provides a peaceful hideaway just 3.5 km from the city centre. The Sanctuary of the Divine Mercy is within a five-minute walk and the historical Kazimierz Jewish District is just 3 km away, while guests can reach the city centre in just 15 minutes via excellent local transport links. Guestrooms are en-suite with a homely feel and feature underfloor heating in the bathroom, LCD satellite TV and Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar, plus there is a large garden terrace for relaxing al fresco during the warmer months of the year. Other benefits for guests include 24-hour reception, tour and ticketing services and private parking.
